A non-profit organization, Iran Human Rights, reported that by 19 November 2022, at least 378 people had died due to government involvement in the protests, including 43 minors under 18. This was the deadliest protest since the 2019-2020 protests which had over 1,500 deaths.

Julie Ledru plays Julia in the movie. She is a young woman living in social housing and is not close with her mother. She loves motocross and tries to get the chance to do it. To do this, she pretends to be a customer on shopping sites to borrow bikes for test rides.

The movie focuses on a wealthy, private family that has lived in their mansion for months to keep their community from learning their daughter, Hélène, had a one-night stand and became pregnant. However, their plan is disrupted when Hélène leaves soon after the baby is born to find the father.
Before the 2022 FIFA World Cup started, Qatar was accused of hiring actors to pretend to be fans in order to make their country look better.

On the fifth day of flight (November 20, 2022, at 19:09 UTC), the Orion spacecraft entered the Lunar sphere of influence. || This meant that the Moon's gravitational force became stronger than Earth's relative to the spacecraft.
The goals of these missions include setting up a human base on the Moon and showing the technologies and approaches to business needed for future research, such as exploring Mars.

They praised the direction by Coogler, the action sequences, production and costume design, the cast's performances (especially Wright, Gurira, Huerta, and Bassett), emotional weight, musical score, and how it honored Boseman. Piers Morgan interviewed Ronaldo on 14 November. || In the interview, Ronaldo said he felt "betrayed" by ten Hag and "two or three others" who wanted him to leave the club. || He added that they doubted him when he said he couldn't attend pre-season training due to his daughter's illness. || Ronaldo also said he didn't respect ten Hag "because he doesn't show respect for me", making him disappointed in the communication of the club.
